| HistoryText             = H.E.A.R.T. were a group of mercenaries that were highly effective, though their services were very expensive. H.E.A.R.T. were hired by the Cypress Hills Community Action Group to hunt down [[Daniel Ketch (Earth-616)|Ghost Rider]] who was suspected in the disappearances of several children in the area. H.E.A.R.T. attacked Ghost Rider as he was battling [[Blackout (Lilin) (Earth-616)|Blackout]]. H.E.A.R.T. fired upon Ghost Rider, knocking him into a crypt. Ghost Rider was found by members of the [[Morlocks (Earth-616)|Morlocks]] and taken away into their underground network of tunnels. H.E.A.R.T. hunted for Ghost Rider in the tunnels and came into conflict with [[X-Factor (Earth-616)|X-Factor]]. H.E.A.R.T. retreated and learned that the children that went missing had been taken by the Morlocks for their protection.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 3 8|9}}

H.E.A.R.T. was then hired again to go after Ghost Rider by the demon [[Deathwatch (Earth-616)|Deathwatch]].{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 3 10}} H.E.A.R.T. tracked Ghost Rider as he was battling Blackout again. H.E.A.R.T. cut tied with Deathwatch after learning Blackout worked for Deathwatch.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 3 15}}

The members of heart except for their leader [[Tyler Meagher (Earth-616)|Tyler Meagher]] by the [[Firm (Earth-616)|Firm]] when it attacked their headquarters,{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 3 33}} and Meagher was transformed into a cyborg killer by the Firm to capture Ghost Rider.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 3 35}}
